title: 1.7.10王国mod
author: dougou
txt_content: 从网上找了一个1.7.10的王国mod但是安到mods文件夹里，进游戏就闪退

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 请把你的错误报告发出来\.minecraft\crash-reports

replies.author: dougou
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2017-1-23 09:25
请把你的错误报告发出来\.minecraft\crash-reports
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
